Line 44: Line 44:
==Zune Marketplace==
==Zune Marketplace==
â
[[Image:Zune software.png|thumb|300px|Zune software for Windows PCs showing the Zune Marketplace]]
 
====Music====
====Music====
Initially offering 2 million songs, the Zune Marketplace has grown to offer 11 million songs<ref name="ReferenceA">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TfKsS113nAY</ref>, all of which are now available in MP3 format at up to 320kbps and are [[Digital rights management|DRM]]-free. Music on Zune Marketplace is offered by the [[World music market|big four music groups]] ([[EMI]], [[Warner Music Group]], [[Sony BMG]] and [[Universal Music Group]]), as well as smaller music labels.<ref name="ReferenceA"/>
Initially offering 2 million songs, the Zune Marketplace has grown to offer 11 million songs<ref name="ReferenceA">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TfKsS113nAY</ref>, all of which are now available in MP3 format at up to 320kbps and are [[Digital rights management|DRM]]-free. Music on Zune Marketplace is offered by the [[World music market|big four music groups]] ([[EMI]], [[Warner Music Group]], [[Sony BMG]] and [[Universal Music Group]]), as well as smaller music labels.<ref name="ReferenceA"/>
